page.title: 07LOCAL HISTORY-GOTHAM CHURCH
page.content: Incorporated in the new entrance there are two etched glass windows in memory of Grace Forrest who was the church organist for nearly a quarter of a century. The Rector has an interesting life because of the variety of people he meets and each day is quite different from the next. A church newsletter "The Messenger", is compiled and distributed to the villagers each month.Generally,coming events and services are advertised and comments of appreciation are published. The church clock is a good time- keeper,but occasionally it has been known to stop after a storm.
